definitions: To be revealed or become known.
To emerge from a place or container.
To declare oneself to be lesbian, gay, bisexual, or transgender.
To result or end up in a particular way.
To be removed from something, such as a stain.
examples: The truth will come out eventually.
She came out of the house.
Their new album comes out next month.
He decided to come out to his family.
How did the project come out?
